department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Dredging at Little River, Victoria County Small Craft Harbour (SCH), Nova Scotia, and disposal of dredged material at a designated dredge material management site in Birch Plain, NS.
description: This is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase process: the first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second phase (Phase Two) will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. The qualification list will expire within 60 days or upon award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever is earlier, and the prequalification list will not be used in any other solicitation.
